title: #111 POP Dive: 1999's Drop Dead Gorgeous with Actress Mindy Sterling & Writer Lona Williams
itunes:title: #111 POP Dive: 1999's Drop Dead Gorgeous with Actress Mindy Sterling & Writer Lona Williams
itunes:subtitle: In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny welcomes actress Mindy Sterling about 1999's Drop Dead Gorgeous, which Mindy co-starred. They discuss favorite moments, working on the film, and so much more. Danny also talks with Lona Williams, the write...
description:
In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny welcomes actress Mindy Sterling about 1999's Drop Dead Gorgeous, which Mindy co-starred. They discuss favorite moments, working on the film, and so much more. Danny also talks with Lona Williams, the writer of the iconic film.


*To support this podcast & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
